headline.print_headline: Setting Industry Guidelines for Marketing Junk Food

headline.main: Swapping Meat for Nuts to Lower Diabetes Risk

docs.abstract: Eating red meat, and in particular processed red meat like bacon and hot dogs, raises the risk of Type 2 diabetes. But replacing just one serving a day with nuts or low-fat dairy can lower the risk.
docs.lead_paragraph: Eating red meat, and in particular processed red meat like bacon and hot dogs, raises the risk of Type 2 diabetes. But replacing just one serving a day with nuts or low-fat dairy can lower the risk, according to a study by Harvard researchers.
docs.snippet: Eating red meat, and in particular processed red meat like bacon and hot dogs, raises the risk of Type 2 diabetes. But replacing just one serving a day with nuts or low-fat dairy can lower the risk.

headline.main: From Koch, a Child’s Tale of Health and Self-Acceptance

docs.abstract: Former Mayor Edward I. Koch and his sister have written a cautionary children’s book, “Eddie Shapes Up,” a more or less autobiographical account of a youngster who faces down dietary demons to emerge healthy and self-accepting.
docs.lead_paragraph: As mayor, Edward I. Koch would often deflect insults by insisting that he was not, among other things, a “wacko,” a “dope” or a “punching bag.” But he now admits that the taunt that stung most was inflicted well before he acquired a politician’s thick skin.
docs.snippet: Former Mayor Edward I. Koch and his sister have written a cautionary children’s book, “Eddie Shapes Up,” a more or less autobiographical account of a youngster who faces down dietary demons to emerge healthy and self-accepting.

headline.seo: Cardiovascular Risk in Middle Age May Hasten Mental Decline
headline.print_headline: Risks: Heart Risks May Hasten Mental Decline
headline.main: Risks: Heart Risks May Hasten Mental Decline

docs.lead_paragraph: A study showed that people who had diabetes or high blood pressure at the beginning of the study were more likely to have signs of brain deterioration and lower mental function 13 years later.
docs.snippet: A study showed that people who had diabetes or high blood pressure at the beginning of the study were more likely to have signs of brain deterioration and lower mental function 13 years later.

headline.seo: Sway of Social Networks on Behavior May Be Overestimated
headline.print_headline: Catching Obesity From Friends May Not Be So Easy
headline.main: Catching Obesity From Friends May Not Be So Easy

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers who published studies suggesting that conditions and behaviors like obesity, happiness, smoking and loneliness could be contagious are under serious critical fire.
docs.snippet: Researchers who published studies suggesting that conditions and behaviors like obesity, happiness, smoking and loneliness could be contagious are under serious critical fire.

headline.main: Weight Loss Improves Sex for Diabetic Men

docs.abstract: Losing just a small amount of weight can improve the sex lives of men with diabetes, new research shows.
docs.lead_paragraph: Losing just a small amount of weight can improve the sex lives of men with diabetes, new research shows.
